author: maccman@gmail.com
msg: There are two issues this commit fixes:

1) find returns results in directory order. I.e. the directory comes before the directories children. This means the directory is renamed before the children - causing errors as the paths to the children are no longer valid. find -d fixes this

2) The previous sed statement was replacing any reference to ___PROJECTNAME___ or ___PROJECTNAMEASIDENTIFIER___. This is wrong, it should only be replacing the last reference to ___PROJECTNAME___. For example:
If you replace all instances of ___PROJECTNAME___ with $PROJECT_NAME in the example above, the mv doesn't work.

author: becka11y
msg: fixes issue #212 media play not always calling success callback

updated to use mediaId to store/retrieve audioFile in soundCache dictionary rather than url (url is not available with all media types). Because I was not always finding the audioFile in audioDidFinishPlaying the success callback was not getting called even though the media did successfully play.
Was returning success from stopAudioRecord but should not be - this resulted in two success callbacks from record.  Now only call success from audioDidFinishRecording.

msg: add option for saving photo to the album
